titles.title: A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to extend from 90 days to one year the period after release of a member from the Armed Forces from active duty during which the member is protected from mortgage foreclosure.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1125)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
2/25/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act of 1940 to extend from 90 days to one year the period following release from active duty during which a member of the Armed Forces shall be protected from mortgage foreclosure.
